title: Black Myth: Wukong Breaks Records on Steam - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.20.24
description:
Go to http://hims.com/kindafunny to start your free online visit today.

Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $35 off their best-selling frame.

Black Myth: Wukong breaks records on Steam, Backyard Sports is being revived, and Greg Miller is BACK.

 - The boys are back in town! Friday August 23rd at 8pm, join Nick, Josh Maguca, and Mark Ellis live, and in-person, for a night of comedy at The Lost Church, San Francisco. This is one-night-only so grab your seat fast before they sell out! Head to KindaFunny.com/comedy for details and tickets!
 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
     - Gamescom Opening Night Live - our live reactions
     - GAMESCAST ONL Post Show
 - Coming up later today, Andy and Blessing will be becoming legend in Black Myth Wukong. We know everyone’s been waiting to see this game!
And thanks to our friends at NVIDIA, we’ll show you why this could be one of the best-looking titles released in this the year of our lord, 2024. It’s actually kind of insane how the developers have created such a stunning world. You definitely want to come watch!
So yes, with our 40-series GeForce GPUs from NVIDIA, we can show you the advanced, full ray traced graphics in game, boosted by the AI-powered performance engine of DLSS 3.
 - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
      - You can get today’s Gregway
 - Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Karl Jacobs & Delaney Twining

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:28 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:08:48 - Black Myth: Wukong makes record-breaking debut on Steam - Nicole Carpenter @ Polygon
00:19:23 - Backyard Sports Revival Officially Announced by Playground Productions - Taylor Lyles @ IGN 
00:31:33 - Netflix’s ‘Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft’ Gets a new Trailer - Jennifer Maas @ Variety
00:37:18 -FF16 director says it’s ‘probably likely’ that future Final Fantasy games launch on PC day 1 - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:39:58 - Games Radar changed its name to GamesRadar+
00:45:22 - Wee News!
00:48:17 - SuperChats

game fans Rejoice Backyard Sports the iconic video game series known for making kid-friendly sports games is back in a press release playground Productions the company currently holding the rights to Backyard Sports IP confirmed it was revived the series noting that the franchise is slated to return in the coming months back playground Productions also provided the first teaser trailer of The Backyard Sports featuring memorable characters like Pablo Sanchez and Stephanie Morgan beyond the confirmation of a new Backyard Sports video games playground Productions said the series return will expand its reach to multiple verticals Beyond video games Beyond such as film TV and merchandise playground Productions explain the Revival of Backyard Sports will use Cutting Edge technology and a seed character IP to aim to create stories and experiences that will resonate with those who grew up with the series along with the current generation of Youth Michael Howard did you grow up with Backyard
